    • Method Detail

      • loadFXML

        public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane loadFXML(java.lang.String pathToResource,
                                                java.lang.Object controller)
        Load the fxml view.
        Parameters:
        pathToResource - the path to fxml resource.
        controller - the controller instance of the view (generally is the value of this).
        Returns:
        the root pane of view.
        Throws:
        ViewLoadException - if the fxml can't be loaded.

      • loadFXML

        public static void loadFXML(java.lang.String pathToResource,
                            javafx.scene.layout.Pane rootController)
        Load the fxml view setting the rootController as root element and controller.

        This method should be used when the root element in FXML is a fx:root.

        Parameters:
        pathToResource - the path to fxml resource.
        rootController - the root layout. It also work as controller.
        See Also:
        loadFXML(String, Pane, Object)

      • loadFXML

        public static void loadFXML(java.lang.String pathToResource,
                            javafx.scene.layout.Pane root,
                            java.lang.Object controller)
        Load the fxml view.

        This method should be used when the root element in FXML is a fx:root.

        Parameters:
        pathToResource - the path to fxml resource.
        root - the pane root.
        controller - the controller instance of the view (generally is the value of this).
        Throws:
        ViewLoadException - if the fxml can't be loaded.
